name: Monsters and Myriads
description: When a vial of coveted 'God Blood' gets into the hands of a highschooler, the small Wisconsin town of Shenee will never be the same. This comedic, supernatural adventure pits an unlikley group of teens against false gods, spooky monsters, and homecoming

name: To Charm a Train
description: In a world where Thomas Edison discovers teleportation alongside the lightbulb and a magical race of 'Fae' mediate between human and animal, a cowboy fae recruits the last train to steal back the western storms from the Boston mob.

name: Soot and Charms
description: The whole flavor of To Charm of Train expanded, remastered, and revised to empower YOU to join in through a partnership with Graftbound Press.
